data.persona: My great-grandfather was a duke.  My family used to own a castle.  I have out coat of arms on my mantle.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
There's an ornate chair, a hanging tapestry, a painting., and a wooden table here.
The ghost is here.

You are carrying a priceless painting, wearing a royal coat of arms, and wielding a Kings sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the painting to the ghost to appease it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to exorcise the ghost that has been haunting this castle so that the ghost will stop terrifying my family and our visitors.
data.long_motivation: I want to prepare the castle for a princess who is visiting us soon because I have heard that she is rich and very beautiful and I would like her to be impressed by our home.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: wear royal coat of arms and royal outfit

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get priceless painting from wall of dining hall

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get hanging tapestry from center of dining hall

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put hanging tapestry on blank space where the priceless painting used to hang
